biotools.summary: This BioExcel Building Blocks library (BioBB) workflow provides a pipeline to setup DNA structures for the Ascona B-DNA Consortium (ABC) members. It follows the work started with the NAFlex tool to offer a single, reproducible pipeline for structure preparation, ensuring reproducibility and coherence between all the members of the consortium.

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: ABC MD Setup
